website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for an affordable, decent-sounding pair of earbuds, start with the Sennheiser CX 300. Sennheiser's first in-ear design sounds like a winner to us.
pros: The Sennheiser CX 300 offers solid sound quality, significant isolation from outside sounds, and an ultralightweight design, as well as three sizes of silicon ear tips to ensure a perfect fit--all for well less than $100
cons: The Sennheiser CX 300 doesn't come with a travel pouch or any other accessories

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, crisp, sound and well built!
customer_reviews.text: These sound exceptional. Really really crisp sound, and very deep bass. Everything you would expect from Sennheiser. The little carry case is really useful, and protects them. I hope that these will withstand the test of time and don't break anytime soon. They also fit nicely in my ears and don't fall out easily! UPDATE: Sadly I am going to have to return these headphones. After a month or so of use there are too many flaws. For some reason the headphone jack doesn't fit correctly and comes out VERY easily. Every time I walk with these in, the jack comes out my phone in my pocket several times. The lack of volume buttons is also very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Scott

customer_reviews.title: These were a mistake, terrible sound quality, complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are dreadful. I strongly recommend that you do no buy them. I have had Sennheiser in ear headphones before from a similar price bracket and they were absolutely brilliant, clear and bassy. These new ones are awful, they genuinely sound like they're not working correctly however, after contacting amazon I have been told they are. There is little to no bass, the mid range dominates and is raspy and the high range is dull and irritating. These really are bad, I have completely wasted my money and hope no one else does.
customer_reviews.author: eezamcgrookes

customer_reviews.title: Quality you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Great earphones, good solid quality. Only slightly better sound quality than the, much cheaper, competitors, but more sturdily built. My only real negative is that the track skip/selection button isn't very responsive, hidden as it is under a protective layer of some kind. But then I don't get phantom track skips, unwanted volume changes like I did with the cheaper competitors, so overall I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hub

customer_reviews.title: Good enough but not brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of headphones by this brand. They no longer make my old ones so I chose these instead. They were more expensive but I didn't mind that. The cable is strong and sturdy and you get a choice of earpads to fit on. Unfortunately I couldn't quite find a perfect fit - they are not as comfortable as my previous pair. The main issue I have is that. you CANNOT adjust the volume from the remote on the cable. This is quite annoying when listening to music and it is disappointing that these are supposed to be a higher spec than my previous pair but they have less functionality.
customer_reviews.author: purplegirl

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The headphones a little bit heavy and it's easy moving from my ears. The quality of the sounds not as expected and the volume not that much strong. Didn't complete 2 months and it's already making problems! Really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Customer from Wales

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an older pair of Sennheiser earphones which must have been 9 years old and they were still working until broke them. There was no hesitation in buying a new pair and the same brand Sennheiser and these are as good if not better. They are really good quality, with a good quality cable and plug and they offer excellent sound. I love wireless earphones but I still prefer a pair of wired earphones for convenience!
customer_reviews.author: PurplePetals

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable headphones with effective mike - I use these on conference calls and for listening to music - speech /sound quality on calls is excellent and the buds themselves comfortable for several hours of use (several sizes are included). However I find it impossible to alter the volume via the control - pausing, and skipping forward work well though - hence the 2 star rating for this element.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: For such a big name as Sennheiser this item was very disappointing. it was rather clunky with much thicker and less pliable wires than the cheaper version I bought earlier. The volume control was clunky and it seems not to have a louder or quieter slide. it just has stop/start. I feel that they have cut costs and produced an inferior product. I will not buy their products again. Very bad value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Mim Umney-Gray

customer_reviews.title: Solid earphones
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for a few months now, very pleased with them. Pros: - Good noise isolation, fits the ear well and doesn't let noise through. - Comes with a handy little pouch I've used every day - keeps them safe and untangled Cons: - Slightly disappointed there is no volume control, only stop/start button. - One of the earphones has a slightly bad contact, pulling on the cord a little makes the music go quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Left earpiece stopped working after 2 months and cables arent ergonomic.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointing as i usually love sennheiser. Very comfortable in ear headphones and good sound quality, however the left earpiece stopped working after only 2 months. The cables are flat and make from a strange rubber that tends to catch on clothing and just isnt ergonomic at all. Lastly when using them for phone calls several people commented that there was a constant buzzing at their end of the line.
customer_reviews.author: TMez

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are a replacement for a similar pair destroyed by a cat with a liking for rubberised cables, so I knew what I was getting. Not an audiophile but for me the sound is fine. Once set up on my phone the bass levels etc. are just as I like them. The fit is fine and they are comfortable to wear on a 1.5h commute
customer_reviews.author: MrC v5

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I just got these earphones for two weeks and the right ear bud stopped working, I only used it in gym and at work, didn't seemed like I damaged the cable myself but it just stopped working. TBH the sound quality isn't even better than the £25 earphone I got in tesco, extremely disappointed, a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Zhang Han Xue

customer_reviews.title: Great quality as always from sennheiser
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are just amazing! You get the same sennheiser quality at the fraction of the price of their overhead headphones. They are also really comfortable as they are in-ear, which also means they are great at noise cancelling in a loud university library!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound good but comfort less so
customer_reviews.text: Happy with sound quality and function but on a practical level the earbuds don't seem to stay in my ears and keep falling out. The rubber cushions fall off as well! Bit disappointed with them but my last pair were the same brand and were faultless, hence buying a new pair thinking that they were the same design!
customer_reviews.author: G L Havelock

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the best ! I was happy to buy Sennheiser again as my old ones were great sound - these are poor sound not comfy and keep falling out of my ears For the price I expected much better in all departments- very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Todor Shoilekov

customer_reviews.title: Seem to do the trick
customer_reviews.text: I have used this manufacturer before and have always been happy with the results. Thus far, not disappointed. Am only using in laptop right now, but they do the trick. They are a comfy in-ear fit and the quality is crisp.
customer_reviews.author: rob brion

customer_reviews.title: Whats more to say.
customer_reviews.text: After losing my old sennheiser ear canal headphones, I have tried many different ones from other manufacturers. All of the others could not measure up in noise blocking, sound quality or comfort. Even without music playing, these are as if I am wearing ear plugs, and block out 80% of noise. When on planes, I am able to have the volume v low, allowing me to sleep as the music blocks the plane noise. Well done Sennheiser on another great product.
customer_reviews.author: Andy McCutcheon

customer_reviews.title: Sennheiser earphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a present it came quickly they look great well presented allso with extra ear pods in different sizes well thought out product nice packaging a little over priced but still worth it
customer_reviews.author: G H

customer_reviews.title: Ok headphones
customer_reviews.text: The previous model had better bass, and a shape on the rubber ear adapter things that fit better in the ear. These ones, even with the various sizes are uncomfortable and they don't properly seal.
customer_reviews.author: Dan F

customer_reviews.title: Bad build quality
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I ordered arrived broken as the right ear would go quiet for no reason. Got a replacement and the microphone and button attached broke after less than 2 months with no physical damage at all. Earphones are decent but build quality not good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Game Critic 1050

customer_reviews.title: The ear buds aren't interchangeable with any others
customer_reviews.text: Inevitably, a bud fell off and was lost while I was travelling. No big deal. I have loads of replacements. But NONE of them fitted - they were all too big, and fell off or, worse, stayed stuck in my ear when I took the phones out. so I ordered a packet of Sennheiser buds. And NONE of them fitted, either. I have had to buy replacement earphones, to replace a lost ear bud.
customer_reviews.author: Jv Gowshall

customer_reviews.title: Crazy microphonics
customer_reviews.text: The microphonics from the cord is absolutely terrible. Even when sitting on a couch watching a movie without any movement, it picks up your breathing as it rubs against your t-shirt. Who designs like this? Our new throw away culture is probably to blame where manufacturers are now designing things to last just a few months and then replace it. To be fair most of the in ear headphones at the moment are average at best.
customer_reviews.author: Some shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality buds.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds is very nice, but I have to say there is quite a bit of interference when the cable rubs against clothing or something which is a little disappointing from Sennheiser.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Downes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy crap
customer_reviews.text: These head phones are awful I’ve only had short time the buds fall off n now the one side is broken wires not up to scratch on previous ones don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Moira Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good sound, good design. Perfect value for money
customer_reviews.text: Solid pair of headphones, good build quality and sound quality for the price paid. I'd say 3/5 noise cancelling effectiveness. Perfect for office work or trains, less good with loud traffic or sitting at the back of a bus; but considering the cost totally worth it. Lead never tangles and the carry pouch is nice quality. The audio control button is not as sensitive as one would like but this is minor.
customer_reviews.author: DuWan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I always loved sennheiser but this is second time they don't last. I bought them 8 months ago. For this price they should last longer. I looked after them too. Waste of money. Sennheiser used to mean durable high quality. Not any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect sound
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this for my boss and he told me this is better than the one comes free with samsung phones.
customer_reviews.author: Ethem Dere

customer_reviews.title: High quality sound
customer_reviews.text: standard Sennheiser product - in that the sound quality is amazing - like the 4 sizes of ear cover as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No volume control
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I should have read the description more carefully, but I am returning the (unopened) headphones as there is no remote volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a week
customer_reviews.text: Within one week the volume completely stopped coming out of one of the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: simon lunniss

customer_reviews.title: Not reccomend for people on the move.
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended for listening on the move as the thick heavy cables conduct sound up to the earphone when they rub on clothing etc, also heavy cables tent to pull the earphones out of your ear! However the sound quality is crisp and clear.
customer_reviews.author: MR DAVID LISTER

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for people who are picky about audio quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my partner who is very sensitive about audio. He loves them and says great quality. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I felt compelled to write a review because the quality of these ear phones is no longer what they used to be. They are cheap, the cord is far to long and bulky and the ear phone sheaths keep falling off. I would not buy these again and encourage others to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst headphones I have bought from Sennheiser
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting better quality from these headphones. They were faulty when they arrived (sending small electric shocks into my ears as soon as I used them). The ear buds also fell off almost immediately, and I had to put some other spares on. Would not recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: buy with confidence
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say apart from they are really good :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pedlar

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last two months - don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Not even two months old and the forward/rewind button broke and is constantly spamming the iPhone with requests making these earphones totally unusable. Senneheiser build quality has been declining for a while now and this is rock bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Shortland

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great, shame about the multi-functional button..... It's not smart!!!
customer_reviews.text: The multi-functional button has far to much to do that one of the functions doesn't seem to work at all. Considering returning it. I cannot rewind to a previous track. I think that the button just isn't sturdy enough for what it's required to do. disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: June Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So much cable noise
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and comfort are great but there is a huge amount of noise transmitted through the cable when it touches anything. This makes them a nightmare when you are walking around and the cable is moving and touching your clothes, even very lightly.
customer_reviews.author: d a blazey

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds keep falling off
customer_reviews.text: Good sound but ear buds keep falling off. so frustrating, I have now lost one of the buds. each time i take them out of my ears or out of pocket a bud falls off. apart from this ould be a good review but obviously they are useless without the buds
customer_reviews.author: max chambers

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm.
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt block out all sounds about half of the background sound fades The ear buds come off and are easliy lost which doesnt help
customer_reviews.author: Nikita lees

customer_reviews.title: Bad earbuds, way too loose.
customer_reviews.text: The first sennheiser product which disappointed me. Sound quality is as good as always but the rubber ear buds are so loose they stay in your ear when you pull the earphones out. Both sides are this bad.
customer_reviews.author: Karol Leszko

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: After 5 weeks of use the left ear stopped working, and after another week of just using one ear, the right ear also stopped working. Trying to find how to get a refund but can’t see it on this page. Avoid these defective earbuds at all cost.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Peck

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, the right angle jack plug is a clever design, the apple version continually has considerable wear on the plug. Would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Good sound annoying rubber buds
customer_reviews.text: Good priced earphones, good sound, but the cable is a little long and annoying and the rubber buds keep falling off when wrapped up in a bag, pocket or the storing pouch. Never had this issue with other earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Broke after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: Used them as intended, stored only in the pouch until about 3 days ago. Within that period of time one earphone has already become unresponsive. Terrible quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Antonipillai Jepanessan

customer_reviews.title: No better sound than cheaper alternatives
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. I was expecting something better from the sound quality of such a prestigious name, but didn’t find these much different to cheaper headphones I have had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price the highs could definitely be clearer - they're quite mid/bass orientated. Having volume control would also be nice rather than just a play/pause button.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Audio quality on par with cheaper pairs, mine stopped working after a couple months. Got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: James Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good for calls, okay for music
customer_reviews.text: I am usually used to a very good sound quality for Sennheiser headphones but you can hear every time the cable is stroking your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Holtz

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I've been through a LOT of sub £100 earphones in the last 5 years and these are by far the best
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: A present for my daughter. No issues reported since, so ALL GOOD!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good but randomly broke
customer_reviews.text: Great quality earphones although after a few months one of them just stopped, didn’t hit it against anything or snag the cable it just stopped
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and can be worn whether or not you are wearing a hat. Sound quality is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: John MacQuarrie

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but the bass is a little we weak. Great value for money
customer_reviews.author: mr P.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I found these very uncomfortable and the left ear stopped working less than a week after it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Same as always with these guys.... Beyind what i expected for the price
customer_reviews.author: Garry W.

customer_reviews.title: Are these really Sennheiser?  Or fakes?
customer_reviews.text: Broken after 6 weeks - no sound on LHS. Sounded tinny before that. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID H

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these headphones 10 days and already one side of them has broken and now has no sound.
customer_reviews.author: Howe2308

customer_reviews.title: Almost right
customer_reviews.text: Would be better if it had the volume control with the pause/play on the wire.
customer_reviews.author: Elleanor Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Worst product
customer_reviews.text: Poor sound clarity. Not up to the mark.not at all worth for 38 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sennheiser Canal Type Earphone Black CX 300S Black [Domestic Regular Goods]

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars405 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
